name: Quasar
description:
I appreciate your precious time and mine . That's why, i contribute this real time saver useful package.

For your reference please don't mind to check this blog:

https://twentytwo.space/2018/04/01/quasar-revit-dynamo-package/

and contact me @https://twentytwo.space/contact
contents:
CreatDuctsByModelCurves - Create ducts by model curves and family type., CreateBeamsByModelCurves - Create beams by model curves., CustomCheckboxSelection - Create checkboxes  with input list and select items., CustomDropdownSelection - Create a dropdown with checkboxes. First input is a list and Second input is a nested list.

Eg. {"a","b","c"} and {{1,2,3},{4,5,6},{7,8,9}}.
It match their index. So, {1,2,3} is under dropdown "a". , DynamoNodes.DiamondPanel - Surface divides to diamond panels and triangle panels by UV divisions., ElementSelector - Select element by category or parameter inputs ..., FamilyInstanceByTypeName - A type name or comma separated type names to collect family instances., FilterSelectAndDelete - Select filter elements and delete in one shot ..., GetLinkDocument - Get all link document. Each list contains ,

      [0] Name of Link Document (String)
      [1] Link Document (Document)
, LinkReloadFromSelection - Link document reload from select check box., ReloadAllLinkDocument - Reload all link document from their saved path (directory)., SelectElementByParameter - Elements selection by given parameter name and value.
Numeric Operator - ">" , "<" , ">=" , "<=" , "="
String Operator - "begins with" , "contains" , "ends with" , "equals", ViewPortAlignment - Views arrange and align on sheets based on template sheet view ports position and location., ViewSelector - Select views by check boxes , WallPaintRemove - Remove paint from input walls
